extensionDescription.message: A minimalistic web extension for firefox that suspends natively (with tabs.discard) all non-active tabs and requires only minimal permissions to store it's settings and filter URL's.

toggleDefaultOn.description: Text displayed on toggle buttons if not specified (enabled state).

toggleDefaultOff.description: Text displayed on toggle buttons if not specified (disabled state).

titleDisableSuspension.description: Text prepended to toggle button to enable/disable tabs suspension.

toggleDisableSuspensionOn.description: Text displayed on the toggle button when suspension is disabled.

toggleDisableSuspensionOff.description: Text displayed on the toggle button when suspension is enabled.

titleDelaySuspend.description: Text prepended to the input element, specifying for how long a tab should be inactive to be suspended.

titleIgnoreAudible.description: Text prepended to the toggle button, specifying, whether the tabs, playing sound should be suspended.

titleIgnorePinned.description: Text prepended to the toggle button, specifying, if pinned tabs should be suspended.

titleSuspendThreshold.message: Suspend when the loaded tabs count reaches
titleSuspendThreshold.description: Text prepended to the input element, specifying how many active tabs can exist before suspension starts.

toggleSuspendPlannedOn.description: Text on toggle button indicating being in the process of suspending (enabled state).

toggleSuspendPlannedOff.description: Text on toogle button to suspend tabs according to the settings set (disabled state).

toggleSuspendAllPlannedOn.description: Text on toggle button indicating being in the process of suspending (enabled state).

toggleSuspendAllPlannedOff.description: Text on toogle button to suspend tabs disregard the settings (disabled state).

titleAddURL.description: Text prepended to the input element to add URL to a generic list

buttonAddEntry.description: Text on button to add generic list entry.

buttonEditEntry.description: Text on button to edit generic list entry.

buttonDeleteEntry.description: Text on button to delete generic list entry.

buttonConfirmEditEntry.description: Text on button to submit changes to an already existing generic list entry.

buttonExportList.description: Text on button to export list data to a text file.

buttonImportList.description: Text on button to import list data from file.

buttonClearList.description: Text on button to delete all generic list entries.

titleEnableWhitelist.description: Text prepended to toggle button to enable/disable whitelist.

whitelistDescription.message: Tabs with URL's containing patterns from this list will never be suspended. To use regular expressions prepend
whitelistDescription.description: Whitelisting functionality description, followed by code tag

titleEnableBlacklist.description: Text prepended to toggle button to enable/disable blacklist.

blacklistDescription.message: Only tabs with URL's containing patterns from this list will be suspended. Empty list is equivalent to having 'Blacklist: off'. To use regular expressions prepend
blacklistDescription.description: Blacklisting functionality description, followed by code tag.
